item.description:
Join the Brettl-Hupfers Ski and Sports Club at the Boston Ski & Snowboard Expo.

The Ski Expo is a great chance to check out new ski and snowboard gear and find out more about the club at the same time. There are also usually discounts on lift passes and giveaways at the ski mountain booths at the expo.

If you are planning to go to the Expo, we'll have a booth for the Brettl-Hupfers where you can meet some of our members. We'll be at Booth E21. Make sure you search us out and meet some Bretts!

The expo is at the Seaport World Trade Center and runs from Thursday through Sunday.

Thursday, November 10 - 3pm to 10pm
Friday, November 11 - 10am to 10pm
Saturday, November 12 - 10am to 8pm
Sunday, November 13 - 10 am to 6pm

More info on the expo website here: http://www.bewisports.com/expos/boston/
And a link to discount tickets to the expo: http://www.bewisports.com/expos/boston/coupon/
item.name: Boston Globe Ski & Snowboard Expo Nov. 10 - 13, 2009
